channel.title: Client how to connect to my ip?
channel.description: Ok so i got a client. and i want my client to connect to a certain ip addres. how do i make my client connect to an ip addres i want it 2.?

item.title: Client how to connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Depending on which client base you are using it will be located in the gui.java
Just scroll down untill you see somthing like 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
You then change that to what ip address you would like it to be
Note* 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 are local ip addressâ€™s and will connect to your computer

Read full topic
item.source: Client how to connect to my ip?
